Package bio.singa.simulation.model.modules.concentration

Class ConcentrationDeltaManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.simulation.model.modules.concentration.ConcentrationDeltaManager
  • public class ConcentrationDeltaManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The ConcentrationDeltaManager handles current concentrations of an updatable and the updates to those concentrations that should be applied during simulation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ConcentrationDeltaManager​(ConcentrationContainer initialConcentrations)
      Creates a new Concentration Delta Manager.
